english.segment1: Imagine. If there were no no expectations. If there was no no confidence. If there were no no convictions. If there was no no disappointment.
english.segment2: Why cant you see what I see, this is reality.
english.segment3: Imagine. If there were no no excuses. If there was no no compassion. If there was no no forgiveness. If there was no no guiltiness.
english.segment4: Why can't you see what I see, this is reality.
english.segment5: I see the necessity of all these values, but we have to use them in the right way. I know it's hard to hold on to these ideals, but if I'm too weak, God will push me through.
